origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CentralBankAPI.get_policy_report', 'description': 'This function provides the latest central bank policy report based on the country and report type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the policy report is requested.'}, {'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy report, e.g., monetaryPolicy, fiscalPolicy.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The latest policy report in PDF format.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CentralBankAPI.get_policy_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'Norway', 'reportType'是'monetaryPolicy'.
